name: User
description: The user object describes the identity of a user.

uid.description: The unique identifier of the user associated with the event. For example, for Windows events this is the security identifier (SID) of the user account.

domain.description: The domain where the user is defined. For example: the LDAP or Active Directory domain.

full_name.description: The full name of the user.

groups.description: The administrative groups to which the user belongs.
